attributes.action: Not to allow your local councils to photograph and value peoples properties for council tax reasons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How dare the goverment have the audacity to bring in a policy that could have a member of a local council entering your house to photograph and value it for council tax purposes.Also rumors are that a fine would be issued for non compliance.There is no way I would allow a gubby council member into my home. Has the Prime Minister ever heard the phrase an Englishmans home is his castle?But this statement probablys cant be used now incase it offends our so called mulicultural society

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
